article.title: THEI Supports Strategic National Infrastructure Projects

content.text: THEI demonstrates its commitment to national development by participating in several National Strategic Projects (PSN). Our fleet of heavy equipment has been deployed to ensure smoothness and efficiency at various vital project sites across Indonesia.
The Key Role of THEI's Fleet

From excavators for earthworks to bulldozers for land clearing, our units work tirelessly to support the acceleration of infrastructure projects such as toll roads, dams, and industrial areas. The reliability and high performance of our heavy equipment are crucial factors in keeping project schedules on time.

content.alt: THEI excavator operating at a project site

content.text: Our involvement in the PSN is tangible proof of THEI's vision not only to be a provider of heavy equipment solutions but also to be a strategic partner in the advancement of Indonesia's infrastructure. We are proud to be part of the history of this nation's development.
